body: Who is looking forward to New Year's Eve? Everyone have a good night sleep and a wake up!
body_tagged: Who is looking forward to New Year's Eve? Everyone have a good night sleep and a wake up!
title: New Year This Night!

replies.body: 36 Minutes to go. I wish I could be more optimistic about the new year but the motivation just isn't there.
replies.body_tagged: 36 Minutes to go. I wish I could be more optimistic about the new year but the motivation just isn't there.

replies.body:
That's a shame.

Yes, I am forward to next year! Every year should bring something new and exciting to the table, while opening up more possibilities in life.

replies.body: I'm looking forward to making a new years resolution and then not following it! For me like 14 hours to go.
